title: JSW MG Motor India retail sales dip 9 pc in June to 4,644 units
description: JSW MG Motor India reported a 9% year-on-year decline in retail sales for June, with 4,644 units sold compared to 5,125 units in June 2023. Despite this, the company's flagship SUV, the ZS EV, achieved its highest-ever monthly sales in June 2024.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
